title: It’s Not All About Remco: Quick-Step Pins Classics Revival on Speedsters Magnier, Merlier, Lamperti
content:
Once kings of the cobbles, will Soudal Quick-Step pack a bite again in the northern classics? ‘The Wolfpack mentality still lives.'

Read the full article at It’s Not All About Remco: Quick-Step Pins Classics Revival on Speedsters Magnier, Merlier, Lamperti on Velo.
author: ahood
